languages.text: "Истине все равно, по нраву тебе ее знамения или нет. Ты попросил{mf||а} меня явить тебе переплетения Путей, и я раскрыл то, что должно тебе знать здесь и сейчас, ни больше, ни меньше".

"It makes no difference to the Truth whether you find its portents agreeable or not. You asked me to show you the twisted Ways, and I have revealed what you are meant to know here and now, no more and no less than that."
languages.original_text: "Истине все равно, по нраву тебе ее знамения или нет. Ты попросил{mf||а} меня явить тебе переплетения Путей, и я раскрыл то, что должно тебе знать здесь и сейчас, ни больше, ни меньше".

traits.speaker: Uralon_Companion

languages.text: « La vérité se fiche éperdument que ses présages vous plaisent ou non. Vous m'avez demandé de vous révéler les Voies sinueuses, et je vous ai montré ce que vous êtes {mf|censé|censée} savoir dans les circonstances actuelles, ni plus ni moins. »
languages.original_text: "It makes no difference to the Truth whether you find its portents agreeable or not. You asked me to show you the twisted Ways, and I have revealed what you are meant to know here and now, no more and no less than that."

traits.locale_text: « La vérité se fiche éperdument que ses présages vous plaisent ou non. Vous m'avez demandé de vous révéler les Voies sinueuses, et je vous ai montré ce que vous êtes {mf|censé|censée} savoir dans les circonstances actuelles, ni plus ni moins. »
traits.speaker: Uralon_Companion

languages.text: «A la Verdad le es indiferente que consideres sus portentos aceptables o no. Me has pedido que te muestre las sendas retorcidas, y yo he revelado lo que debes saber aquí y ahora, ni más ni menos».
languages.original_text: "It makes no difference to the Truth whether you find its portents agreeable or not. You asked me to show you the twisted Ways, and I have revealed what you are meant to know here and now, no more and no less than that."

traits.locale_text: «A la Verdad le es indiferente que consideres sus portentos aceptables o no. Me has pedido que te muestre las sendas retorcidas, y yo he revelado lo que debes saber aquí y ahora, ni más ni menos».
traits.speaker: Uralon_Companion

languages.text: 「真理にとって、その予兆をお前が好ましいと感じるかどうかは関係ない。お前は私にねじれた道を示すよう求めた。そして私は、お前が今ここで知るべきことを明らかにしたに過ぎない。それ以上でも、それ以下でもないのだ」
languages.original_text: "It makes no difference to the Truth whether you find its portents agreeable or not. You asked me to show you the twisted Ways, and I have revealed what you are meant to know here and now, no more and no less than that."

traits.locale_text: 「真理にとって、その予兆をお前が好ましいと感じるかどうかは関係ない。お前は私にねじれた道を示すよう求めた。そして私は、お前が今ここで知るべきことを明らかにしたに過ぎない。それ以上でも、それ以下でもないのだ」
traits.speaker: Uralon_Companion

languages.text: “对真理而言，无论你认为它的征兆是否令人愉快，这都并不重要。你要我向你揭示诡道之道，而我已经告诉了你此时此刻应当知道的一切，恰到好处。”
languages.original_text: "It makes no difference to the Truth whether you find its portents agreeable or not. You asked me to show you the twisted Ways, and I have revealed what you are meant to know here and now, no more and no less than that."

traits.locale_text: “对真理而言，无论你认为它的征兆是否令人愉快，这都并不重要。你要我向你揭示诡道之道，而我已经告诉了你此时此刻应当知道的一切，恰到好处。”
traits.speaker: Uralon_Companion

languages.text: "Es macht für die Wahrheit keinen Unterschied, ob Euch ihre Vorzeichen annehmbar erscheinen oder nicht. Ihr habt mich gebeten, Euch die verschlungenen Wege zu zeigen, und ich habe Euch offenbart, was Ihr hier und jetzt wissen sollt, nicht mehr und nicht weniger."
languages.original_text: "It makes no difference to the Truth whether you find its portents agreeable or not. You asked me to show you the twisted Ways, and I have revealed what you are meant to know here and now, no more and no less than that."

traits.locale_text: "Es macht für die Wahrheit keinen Unterschied, ob Euch ihre Vorzeichen annehmbar erscheinen oder nicht. Ihr habt mich gebeten, Euch die verschlungenen Wege zu zeigen, und ich habe Euch offenbart, was Ihr hier und jetzt wissen sollt, nicht mehr und nicht weniger."
traits.speaker: Uralon_Companion

languages.text: "Emarelerini kabul edilebilir bulup bulmaman, Hakikat için bir fark arz etmiyor. Sana bükülmüş Yolları göstermemi istedin ve ben de burada ve şu anda bilmen gerekenleri sana açık ettim, daha azını değil."
languages.original_text: "It makes no difference to the Truth whether you find its portents agreeable or not. You asked me to show you the twisted Ways, and I have revealed what you are meant to know here and now, no more and no less than that."
